bio: She is a 4 year old calico cat who chooses to only talk sass instead of finding ways to pay the bills.
His name is Toast and he's the woastiest Toast to roast and post on the coast to boast the most!
A needy sweetheart who tries to pretend she don't know witchcraft, but we all know the truth. All hail our Overlord.
AKA Dumpster Baby as that's where she was rescued. She may be sweet, but is built like a tank.
He loves to play fetch, hunt for treats in hard to reach spots, and nap. An extremely friendly good boi.
